title: Problem with new LoL update and windows 10 update.
body: Since the newest major Windows 10 update and newest League update, every time after the loading screen ends and the game starts my computer crashes (freezes). I can't find any info on this problem, maybe someone can help?

replies.body: A recent windows update has been causing freezing issues for some players, and the culprit appears to be the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Disabling this should get you fixed up!
the freezing stopped but i got 998 high ping for no reason..what should I  do?

Oh that's really high!  Your network might be having some problems like packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the match that's happening in for an overview of what's going wrong.  The results will also provide a list of troubleshoot steps specific to your issue.  That should get you fixed up!
Thanks a lot! You've been very helpful :)
